about_the_game:
Pixie Farm VR is a pixie raising simulation VR game where you raise only pixies in a world that seems to have dragons and phoenixes!

●Training

You can train your pixie by choosing your favorite training each month.
The ability to improve varies depending on the map and training, and the failure rate also changes depending on your motivation.
It's up to you whether you want to be a weak pixie or a strong pixie, aim to be the strongest pixie breeder!

●Events

Events will occur in between training sessions, and your pixie's abilities may change.
There are also times when a suspicious doctor appears who recommends a surgery that seems to be almost unsuccessful......?

●Training

You can also send pixies to training to learn techniques.
Sometimes a stray pixie will show up and challenge you to a battle!

●Competitions

You can also send the pixies you've raised to tournaments for them to fight in.
If you win a particular tournament, your rank will increase, and as your rank rises, you can challenge for higher tournaments and raise stronger pixies.

●Soul

Unfortunately, pixies have a life span and must be separated at some point.
There is no such thing as a freezer in this world, but the soul of a deceased pixie will remain forever.
And there are rumors that those souls will help raise the next generation of pixies......?
